comments.comment: Laksa thunak aran den katu meti geyak hadagannath amauine lankawe badu mila haa sewa wala watinakama hetiyata.. api ratawala daha duk vidala ewana salli walin inna anduwala methi amathiwaru gasa kaala maliga hadagena madwata.... apiwa rawattala  ape watina jande ganna kiyala hithala apita denna hadana oya naya mudalath thopima thiyaganilla. Ekath denne api higanno kiyala hitagena. Ape rate palaka pelanthiya rata kewe neththan api hamba karana mudalawala agaya araksha karanne nam apith higanno newei  bolaw wena ratawalata kaburana. Awasanawa kiyanne ape rate bahutharayakta awrudu 70 waka bela mehewarin pita athmayak aththema naa..bahutharaya aduranneth rate athule palana kramaya vitharai lide inna gembo wage.. wena ratawalata yanna awasthawa labunaanam kawadawath oya palana kawadawath anumatha karana ekak naa..minisunge jeewana ththwaya usas karanna dena sahana dekkama.. nawena parapura nam den tika tika loketa viurtha wena bawak penawa.... ethakota wath balmu ape rate heta palana kramayata mokak weida kiyala.....mokada ape rate rassath naa. Rekiyawata sarilana wethanayakuth naa. Adayam vishamathawaya ahasa usata.. parlimenthuwe ayage oni epa kam walata anuwa yojana sammatha karagena rate mahajanayage mudal kolla kanawa.. awurudu 5k parlimenthuwe harak relak wage kee gahala pention ekakuth hadagannawa.. rate sbasiddiyata wedakaranawa  kiyana gaman loku comisuth gahagannawa. Meki noki wanchawan dahasakuth mahaparimanayen rata hemathenama siduwenawa ihala nilathala athara....nithiya katath katath eka haa samana kamak naa. Rate Sampath hora rahase vikunanawa parampara gaanak goda enna beri vidiyata...a sallith hora rahasema pita rata wala ginum walata yanawa...thawa tika kalekadi wahallu washayen ape rate janathawath wena ratakata vikunaida kiyala sekai mehema yanakota..rataka sampath janathawa surakina ratata adaraya karana nayakayan bihi viya uthuwa atha. Ehema nowunahoth mewage ratawal  kawada godayaida? Kiyala kiyanna uda inna deiyo wath danne nethiwa athi.
